resources.string: Centre for Education and Health Research Organization, founded on 12th March 2012, is a non-profit making autonomous body registered under 1860 Societies Act. It is a social venture formed by the students from NSIT, JAMIA, IIIT etc. and has evolved into an organization where the motto is to help anyone with a will to achieve but is held back by lack of resources.

CEHRO believes in not letting poverty come in way of success. We strive to make lives better for the impoverished people and the neglected in our society- the migrant laborers and workers involved in other menial jobs, by helping children from these families achieve academically and extracurricularly, so that they can build a better future for themselves.

For all round development it is essential to consider health as an important parameter. Often health issues come in the way of a childâ€™s education. Hence, we at CEHRO consider it important to sensitize them towards health and hygiene.
